subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 49 points for the Heat, but it was Chris Bosh who hit the night’s biggest shot, a 3-pointer with 57 seconds left that broke a tie game and sent Miami on its way to a 3-1 series lead.
snippet: LeBron James scored 49 points for the Heat, but it was Chris Bosh who hit the night’s biggest shot, a 3-pointer with 57 seconds left that broke a tie game and sent Miami on its way to a 3-1 series lead.
